name: Greek Chicken Power Bowl
preparation: Preheat oven to 400° F. Line Sheet Pan with Sheet Pan Liner.
Stir together quinoa, water, and broth mix in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover; microwave on high, 12 min.
Meanwhile, place chicken and dip mix in a bowl. Squeeze juice from lemon. Stir to mix.
Spread chicken out on lined pan. Roast until chicken is cooked through, about 15 min. Let cool slightly, then slice.
Meanwhile, slice pepper, cucumber, and cherry tomatoes.
Once cooked, divide quinoa between four bowls. Arrange chicken, pepper, cucumber, and tomatoes in bowls. Drizzle dressing on top; top with feta and additional toppings, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.

products.name: Greek Dressing Mix
summary: Herbs make salad dressings taste great, but they can be a pain to buy and use while fresh. Enter our Greek Dressing to solve the problem. Packed with only good food ingredients, including garlic, oregano, mint, and zero additives, it’s easy to make your own healthy dressing with this simple blend. Just mix it with olive oil and red wine vinegar and give it a shake. Add crumbled feta or Greek yogurt for a creamier dressing.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
